q1.question: Anemia is a common condition. What happens when a person has anemia?
options: The body produces too much iron
The blood doesn't have enough RBC
Too many white blood cells are produced
q1.answer: The blood does not have enough red blood cells

q2.question: What is the most common cause of anemia?
options: Too little iron in the blood
q2.answer: Too little iron in the blood

q3.question: Which of these groups is the most likely to have anemia?

q4.question: How does anemia affect the body?
options: The body dosen't get enough O2
q4.answer: The body dosen't get enough O2
